text.Prompt: Can you tell me how to see page likes on facebook?
text.Response A: Sure, you can do this from the facebook app or website.  If you’re using the app, you can click on the “Like” button next to any post, and you’ll see the number of people who have liked the post.  If you’re using the website, you can click on the “Like” button next to any post, and you’ll see the number of people who have liked the post, as well as the number of people who have shared the post.  You can also click on the “Like” button next to your own profile picture, and you’ll see the number of people who have liked your profile picture.  You can also click on the “Like” button next to a page, and you’ll see the number of people who have liked the page.
text.Response B:
Open Facebook on your computer or mobile device.
Click or tap on the Search field.
Type in the name of the page you're looking for.
Click or tap on the page from the search results.
Find the number of likes on the page.

889.displayed_text:
Prompt

Can you tell me how to see page likes on facebook?

Response A

Sure, you can do this from the facebook app or website. If you’re using the app, you can click on the “Like” button next to any post, and you’ll see the number of people who have liked the post. If you’re using the website, you can click on the “Like” button next to any post, and you’ll see the number of people who have liked the post, as well as the number of people who have shared the post. You can also click on the “Like” button next to your own profile picture, and you’ll see the number of people who have liked your profile picture. You can also click on the “Like” button next to a page, and you’ll see the number of people who have liked the page.

Response B

Open Facebook on your computer or mobile device.
Click or tap on the Search field.
Type in the name of the page you're looking for.
Click or tap on the page from the search results.
Find the number of likes on the page.
